title: The Cadillac F1 team explained: Origins, people and goals
summary: Cadillac's F1 team, backed by General Motors, will join the grid in 2026, combining veteran drivers, a Ferrari-powered car, and long-term plans for a full works operation. Here's all you need to know about the project

qa_pairs.question: In what year is the Cadillac F1 team set to join the Formula 1 grid?
Which engine supplier will power the Cadillac F1 team?
Who is backing the Cadillac F1 team?
